values:
That's right! I'm back in action with my livejournal!  So anyways...It is now officially ONE MONTH until school let's out for us seniors! It is really one of the happiest moments ever, but then again at the same time, it is sad..I will miss everyone, but since I still have a month, Im going to make it the best month ever.  Ya know, things right now are actually going very well for me. Chaz and I are   extremely happy. Tomorrow will be our 3 month anniversary. It feels like so much longer than that. Ya know, he makes me so happy!!

Anyways, I don't really have all that much to write in here today. Of course, today is one of my lazy days because in fact it is a Monday! My lazy days seem to be coming more and more often as the school year comes to its end!! Oh well, what can ya do? Welp, I guess Im gonna go play some Mario Party!! Catch ya on the flip side!



I love My Chazy so much!!
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/13214.html

Baby when I look at you,
You know it breaks my heart in two,
How beautiful you are


Seen you in a million dreams,
now you're finally here with me,
We will never be apart


I wanna hold you forever,
That's all I'll ever need


You are my love, you are my life,
My heart and soul the truest friend I've ever known,
You are my world, all of my dreams,
My fantasy, my reality,
I love everything you are, yes I do


Everytime I close my eyes,
Hit's me so deep inside,
How ill this feelin is,

I'm intoxicated by your touch,
It's a sweet sweet rush,
I'm in love with your kiss,


You're the one that I trust the most,
You changed me,


You are my love, you are my life,
My heart and soul the truest friend I've ever known,
You are my world, all of my dreams,
My fantasy, my reality,
I love everything you are,


You are my love, you are my life,
My heart and soul the truest friend I've ever known,
You are my world, all of my dreams,
My fantasy, my reality,
I love everything you are,
Everything, I love everything, you are
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/6326.html

All I have to say is wow! What a guy he is! Jessy and I went up to Eastern again today, and it was a blast.  I have so much fun everytime that I go up there. So many fun people to hang out with! Especially the guys.  When I want to have a good time, and get away from problems around here, I GO TO EASTERN! They always let me have a good time.

Today, I sat there and watched them play poker, because obviously I don't know how too. Natalie doesn't either, and that was what my entertainment for the night was! Lol..right Nat Cat?? Anyways, I got to see Tony again today. That boy is THE coolest guy I have ever met in my life!! I wish he was online right now so that I could talk to him..lol cuz it would be fun. Him, Natalie, and I were spooning on the couch! Lol that was lots of fun too! Just cuz it was very comfortable!  We also did card tricks! I finally got to pull mine off! HECK YES! 

Well I guess I'm off to bed now because I have school in the morning and I'm extremly tired! Write more later!!

See ya on the flip side yo!! :-D
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/6054.html

I get lost in the sparkle,
Your eyes capture me.

You have a way with words,
Your voice is too sweet.

You have familiar hands,
Your touch is gentle.

I woke up this morning thinking it was just another day,
But when I met you my life went a different way.

 

**This is a poem that I wrote last night..just thought I would show it to everyone!**
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/5864.html

Today was so much fun! I want to thank a couple of people for that..Natalie, Cassie, Tony, Drew, Travis..and that one girl..I didn't catch her name!

I went up to Eastern today with Cassie to have a little bit of fun, and we had soo much fun!! We met Tony and Drew, and they were totally cool.  Something about Tony though, he caught my eye! So we went to the mall, but on the way there, WE GOT LOST! But thankfully Drew was from around there and he got us there safely! When we got there, I got into a fight with this guy from FYE. He was soo mean, so I thought I would stick up for my friends and get back in his face after he got in mine! But anyways, we didn't have that much money, so we decided to leave and grab some McDonalds!

When we got back ,we just decided to sit around and hang out! I have never had that much fun just sitting around and talking. That's when we met Travis. I can't wait to go back up there again to see all of them. I hope that I can stay in touch with them when Im here at home. I'm thinking about going up there for school next year. That would be extra cool!! Welp, I guess Im done here! Im gonna go eat some cookies and wait for Nat Cat to call me back!! xoxo to everyone!!!

**Have you ever met someone, and it just seemed so different than everyone else you meet? You get this feeling inside of you that makes you smile? What about everytime you look at that person and you just can't seem to look away? That's how I felt today with someone!! It was the strangest feeling to overcome me, but if I could do it all again, I would in a heartbeat.**
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/5579.html

http://dimples417.livejournal.com/5216.html

Welp, I don't really have much to put in here.  I'm just so alone right now..not just physically, but mentally...I hope that when I go up to Eastern, I will have myself a good ol time with a good ol pal named Natalie and Cassie.

Well, I'm going up to Eastern today, and I guess according to Natalie, we are supposed to go on like a triple date thing...so we will see how that works out..even though I don't know why any guy would want to meet me..I would probably just scare them off. Who knows :-/ I have to go get ready for the day, and then we are off to Eastern. I'm going to try and find a way to have myself a good time and not worry about things here back at home! Call the cellular if you would like to talk to me, or please leave nice comments, cuz those are alway fun to read.

**I like him, but the question is, does he like me back??**
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/5099.html

So today was pretty fun!!

I went to the football game with Jessy and Heather! It was freezing cold out, but I was there to support my boys! Anything for them!!  But anyways..I wanted to thank Heather and Danny Williams for giving me those flowers today..it really made me feel special, and loved, even though Im not!! Umm...not much really happened today...but ya know, Im really confused..I mean he's cool and all, but I don't know if he likes me.. Oh well, I think I'm going to get going...so if you think that you want to leave me a message, feel free because I can use all the cheering up that I can get!!

:-/

** So alone...so very alone **

Why does this ALWAYS happen to me??
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/4843.html

So I feel like a queen right now because I have a burger king crown on! Anyways, today was a pretty good day all in all!! I went to the basketball game and the swim meet! I had a ton of fun with my friends!! The girls basketball team didn't win, but I still love them and they are always the best in my book!!! I heard that the girls swim team won..so Good Job Ladies, keep it up!!

We went to Burger King afterwards, and their computers were down, so it was kind of slow, but good thing I have a lot of patience because I would have left! I scarfed my food down, and I think when I burped afterwards, I shook the whole place!!

So I don't know what to do. I think I like him, but I don't know...He only wants to be friends, but then again I don't know if he likes me more than that, because I haven't asked him!! I don't know what to do. If you think you could help me out, IM me on Dimples2305

Write more later!!
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/4363.html

RIGHT NOW IM ON THE PHONE WITH NATALIE SHIRVANIAN! FREE MINUTES!! But anyways,I'm so tired today! Nothing really happened!!  The most interesting part of my day is when Zack and Robert decide to play a little joke on me! They put my faceplate of my radio and put it under the seat!! I didn't think that was very funny because I was getting really P.O.ed....I didn't have anything to listen to on the way home from school!!

I went with Cassie, Jessy, and Kyle to Subway to visit Heather, and that was a lot of fun just being there and watching her work..She does a lot of crap!! Welp, not much to put in here, so I guess Im going to get going!! Please leave comments!! :-D
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/4189.html

Welp, today was just another day!! School, hung around, went to the basketball game, and then went out to dinner with my friends!! The one thing that I didn't like about the basketball game was that *he* wasn't there. He goes to all of them, and then now he doesn't to this one!

I don't know what to think anymore..lol I don't even know if I really like him, but it sure does seem like it. I'm sorry this is so short, but I have to go to bed soon! Write more later, I PROMISE!! :)
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/3845.html

I don't know why he does what he does, playin' lost and found with your love,
tryin' to confuse you use you girl he gonna lose you sure enough.
Don't know why he says all those things, always shootin down all your dreams,
he otta know better than that, he otta be watchin his back, cause you know, you know,

Girl i love the shine in your eyes, if only just for a moment girl i'd be satisfyed, if i could only touch your cheek, maybe thats all i need to make my life complete,
cause girl i can make you smile,
if you knew that i was here, wishin' i could just be your tear.

I don't know why he cant find the words, sayin' all those things you deserve,
girl if it was me there, i swear, you know you wouldent have to feel so unsure 
about what tommorrow might bring, girl you know i'd give everything,
if i could just hold you like him, if i could be more than just friends, cause you know, you know.

cause girl i can make you smile,
if you knew that i was here, wishin' i could just be your tear.

cause girl i can make you smile,
if you knew that i was here, wishin' i could just be your tear.

Your tear, your tear, wishin' i could just be your tear, your tear, your tear, yeah..
Oh girl i love the shine in your eyes, in your kiss, in your smile, and your touch.
Girl i love that look in your eyes when you say that you need me so much.
If only i could just be your tear yeah yea...............

http://dimples417.livejournal.com/3767.html

Well, today was pretty fun..Im really wore out though...I have the worst back ache in the world. I got to sleep in today which was a great plus! I came home and just sat around for a little while!! Cassie finally picked me up around 2:00 so that we could swing by the Deegan's house! I had to give Lindsay her get well cards from Teach Read Kids! They are so cute!! 

Anyways, we just sat around for hours on end until it was time for us to go get Nat Cat from her house, so that we could take her back up to Eastern. It was so much fun up there!!  I met all kinds of new people, and they were great!! Lets see here..Mike, Amy, Tracy, Lauren I think.. Oh well, I will meet more next weekend when I go up there! Anyways, Im really tired and I have school in the morning, so I need to get my beauty sleep..I need a lot of that..about 17 years worth!! Write more later!!

See ya on the flip side! :-D
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/3364.html

Last night was fun! I stayed with Jessy at Cassie's house, and we just sat around with Danny..Alicia...Nat..Her cousin..and that's it, but it was a lot of fun..we just jumped on the trampoline for hours on end!! And I almost broke my arm and toe! Yesterday would have been more fun if SOMEONE would have called..He knows who he is, and he knows that it was his fault he didn't call! But oh well...

We went to the football game and it was fun because Jenny was trying so hard to get the wrapper off her starburst with her mouth, and when she finally did it, she wanted to be timed! I was excited for Gabe because he played a lot! And the best part about the whole game, VON PAGELS WAS IN THE COUGAR WITH COWBOY BOOTS! It looked sooo funny..CLASSIC..wish I had my camera then.

Went out to eat after that, and MY BOYFRIEND..lol if you must know about that ask me, was our waiter...it was fun..but I guess Im going to get ready for the day..Have to take Natalie back up to Eastern! Talk to Ya later!!
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/3215.html

All I have to say is Why me? I was having a good day and hanging out with my friends, going to dinner, and the movies..and then STEVE ROBINSON my ex boyfriend calls me after 9 months.....tells me that he is stalking me!! What the heck is up with that?? No Im scared that he is going to come up here..because I told him that I hated him..Oh well..we will see whats going to happen.

On a lighter note, I went to dinner and movies with my girls. We saw Ladder 49 and let me tell you..I BALLED LIKE A LITTLE BABY! I recommend it to anyone that is willing to go see it. It is well worth the money! Anyways, I think Im going to go to bed because Im really tired and I have to get up early in the morning!! Please leave me nice messages!! :-D
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/2995.html

Yes, Im extremely tired. First off, I couldn't sleep last night..I don't know why. But I went to school ya know like every other week day!! School is school...lol Well I was getting ready to go to teach read, and to my realization, I HAD A FLAT! I had to drive to teach read with a flat..anyways, I had a teeny tiny nail in there that caused this ruckus!! That's alright because that problem is solved!

I went to the basketball game and the swimming meet at the same time. I had to flip flop back and forth to support my school!! The swimming team crushed Thurston, or so I heard. GOOD JOB LADIES!! And the girls basketball team only lost by a couple of points. It's alright girls, I still love you! Keep your chins up, and you guys will do just fine!! :-D

I went to dinner with Jessy, Cassie, Heather, and Alicia. We went to McDonalds and it was YUMMY!! We just sat and talked about the riddles in Mr. Dummer's class..that was always fun! I hope that we can all hang out again! Well Im going to bed now!! I'll talk to everyone later gator!!
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/2752.html

What a day what a day!! School was school of course..but after school is when the crazyness started! I got a call from Mrs. Deegan about Lindsay, so Sarah Robinson and I went and visited her!! I hope you get better Lindsay! I love you girl!!! :) 
Anyways, after that, Sarah, Melissa, and I went to AppleBees to grab a bite to eat. It was gettin' kinda late, so we couldn't really stay out later to hang out, but it was fun the time that we did hang out!! We were calling plenty people just to mess with them! It was fun, and have to do it again!! Welp, not really much to say, so I think that I'm just going to get going to bed!! Write more tomorrow...
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/2501.html

Thats right, I said it, another day in the bag.  Good thing I finally got the Monday over with. Now I can get on peacefully with the rest of the week. I hate Mondays! I have a bad case of the Mondays!! Lol..Anyways, not much happened today, I slept a lot after school because I had nothing to do!!

I'm supposed to hang out with John Skinner tomorrow. That should be fun, and then I'm supposed to go the game with Dave Hatcher!! It's going to be a lot of fun!! Well sorry that this update isn't much, but I don't really have anything exciting going on in my life right now!! We got homecoming pictures today, and I think they look good even though Gabriel doesn't think so! Whatever to him!!

Welp, my friends are getting ready to leave, so I have to go get ready for beddy!! Leave some comments please! :-D

Hope to meet Dave's friend Ryan soon!!
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/1976.html

The only reason I say Oh No in the title is because I JUST RAN OUT OF SCOOBY DOO FRUIT SNACKS!! Thats alright, there are plenty more upstairs!!

So I don't really know what to say in this update, there wasn't much excitment today.  I think that I'm going to give up on him...He would never like me.  Since I'm going to give up, I think I will work up the courage to put his name in here. His name is..............Paul....anyways, I have to get going. Please leave messages if you feel like you need too!! :-D


Write more later!! :) See ya on the flip side!! hehe
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/1599.html

Last night was boring, but then again crazy. We were so bored that we just drove around for about an hour...Everyone was off doing something of their own.  Cassie and I decided to go back to her house and just make some food, and then go and jump on the trampoline!! It was so much fun because we were both jumping at the same time, and somehow she ended up jumping towards me and hitting me.. we both crashed to the bottom. Good thing we didn't get hurt, but that had to be the funniest thing that happened all night!!  It was nice just to spend some time with my best bud!

Anyways, I was SO tempted to call *him* last night to see if he wanted to hang out, but I chickened out. I think that I just need to move on because I know that he would never like me!! He definately knows who he is...But I think it's my time to go now!! I have to finish up some homework! Leave messages please!!
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/1387.html

What a day!! I had school, but that wasn't bad at all because it was Friday! I came home and spent some time with Bryan because I haven't done that in a long time!! It's nice to spend time with my brother, because there really isn't much time to do that.

I went to the football game with Cassie, Jessy, Heather, and Jenny D. It was so much fun just hangin out with the girls! Anyways, we were gettin' the crap kicked out of us, so we decided to leave at half time! The score was like 60-8 when we left, and we weren't winning...It kinda sucked. But Cassie, Heather, and I went to the dollar show and saw The Notebook again. Even though I have seen that movie before, it never fails to make me cry. It is so sad..and at the same time, it makes me think. I wish that I could find a true love like that. It makes me think about how the love I once had, was never even love at all. It seemed so petty and childish, like I don't even know what love is anymore.

Once again, I wish that I could have *him*. I had a dream last night that he asked me to go out with him. Of course I woke up happy, but then as I really woke up, I came to realize that that would never happen.  You know, one day I will work up the courage to actually put his name in here. Maybe that day, he will see it, if he even reads this, and he might just MIGHT change his mind about me. But I don't think that would ever happen. Well I think I'm going to go to bed now. If you think you might have a clue on my situation and want to help...I would love to read your comments. So please leave them!!
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/1201.html

This title fits my emotions so perfectly right now. I have this feeling of loneliness that keeps haunting me. I look around and everyone has someone. NOT ME! It sucks being like almost the only one without that special someone. When am I going to find someone for me? Or at least find a guy that likes me when I like him. I pose these questions to myself, but never do I seize to find the answers. If you think you know the answers, then please comment..but if they are bad, I don't feel like hearing them. That's the last thing I need right now is hearing something horibble. Well I guess that Im going to get going....Please leave me NICE comments in here! I need some cheering up!!
http://dimples417.livejournal.com/801.html
